column4: is edgy stable enough for someone that's used debian for a long time and ubuntu ever since it came out?
meaning: not completely broken and ready for user testing

I am using Edgy, and my evolution is broken and so is my openoffice.org.. I'm sure an update will fix them soon enough though. not much different than running sid, really.. the point is to test it and report bugs
don't use any of those, thanks
